value.title: Tesla to Host Second Artificial Intelligence Day in August
value.excerpt: Tesla Inc top boss Elon Musk said on Tuesday the electric-car maker will host its second artificial intelligence day on Aug. 19, with the company likely to expand on plans to fine-tune its self-driving technology.

value.title: Safer Driver Assistance Tech Now More Important Than Self-Driving Cars, Consumers Say

value.title: 'Self-driving' microscopes discover shortcuts to new materials
value.excerpt: Researchers are teaching microscopes to drive discoveries with an intuitive algorithm that could guide breakthroughs in new materials for energy technologies, sensing and computing.

value.title: A Smarter Way To Develop New Drugs Using Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: A new artificial intelligence technique has been developed that only proposes candidate molecules that can actually be produced in a lab. Pharmaceutical companies are using artificial intelligence to streamline the process of discovering new medicines.

value.title: Artificial intelligence tapped to fight Western wildfires
value.excerpt: Officials tasked with preventing and battling large, destructive wildfires in the West could soon be using artificial intelligence in addition to their arsenal of prescribed burns, pick axes, chain saws and aircraft.

value.title: AI Ethics Is Especially Vexed By That AI Confinement Problem, Including The Knotty Particulars For Confining Autonomous Self-Driving Cars
